sentence.Network_en: Don't expect that niggard to invite you to dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 别指望那个吝啬鬼会请你吃饭.

sentence.Network_en: The niggard contributed little to them.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个吝啬鬼几乎就没捐钱给他们.

sentence.Network_en: Never have we seen such a niggard like him!
sentence.Network_cn: 象他这样的小气鬼我们何时见过?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以n开头的英语英文单词 ... nigerian 尼日利亚人 niggard 吝啬鬼 niggardly 吝啬的，勉强的.
小气英语怎么说_百度知道 ... mean 自私,可鄙 niggard 小气鬼 1. 你这样说未免太小气了。 It is small of you to say so.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of earlier nigon

means.word_mean: 1. a selfish person who is unwilling to give or spend
